comment: /* Jammu and Kashmir Reorganisation Order (2020) */ update

Addition of citations and grammatical changes

Reverted [[WP:AGF|good faith]] edits by [[Special:Contributions/Rao Ravindra|Rao Ravindra]] ([[User talk:Rao Ravindra|talk]]): Major changes. T/p consensus is required for removal or addition. Take this to talk page. ([[WP:TW|TW]])
Deleted extraneous text not germane to the substance of this article.
/* Background */ It's either "in particular" or "among other things." Can't be both.
Unless there are only two sides to this dispute, we should use "among."

/* top */ Rephrasing the language to be NPOV; removing inessential terms such as eponymously inter alia, and other redundancies; See consensus on [[WT:INDIA]] about language of Kashmir-related articles

/* Background */ Sorry, cannot use that map, please see discussion at [[Wikipedia_talk:Noticeboard_for_India-related_topics#Uniform_format_for_infobox_of_Kashmir-related_first-order_division_articles]]

/* Background */ removing incorrect claim of Buddhist dominated Ladakh; it has a Muslim plurality (46%) and Buddhist minority (40%).  The BBC source, if it says that, I haven't checked, is incorrect; correcting overall tone as well and numbers
